activity: McGill Curl-Up: One leg straight, one bent, hands under lower back. Lift head+shoulders as one unit. Do 6-4-2 pattern (10-sec holds) alternating legs.
done_condition: when you complete 6-4-2 pattern each side

activity: Chin Tucks: Without lifting chin, glide head straight back (make a double chin). Hold 5-10 seconds, 10 reps. Counters forward head posture.
done_condition: when you finish 10 reps with 5-10 second holds

activity: Core Flex (invisible): Pull stomach in, flex abs as if bracing for impact. Hold 10+ seconds, 10 reps. Completely invisible to others.
done_condition: when you finish 10 reps with 10-second holds

activity: Ankle Circles: Under desk, rotate each ankle 10 circles clockwise, 10 counter-clockwise. Improves circulation, lowers blood clot risk.
done_condition: when both ankles complete 20 circles each direction

activity: Glute Squeeze: Contract glutes hard, hold 3 seconds, release. 15 reps. Completely invisible—do anytime while seated.
done_condition: when you finish 15 squeezes with 3-second holds

activity: Wall Plank: Hands on wall at shoulder height, step feet back, maintain straight line. Hold 30 seconds. Easiest plank modification.
done_condition: when you hold for 30 seconds

activity: Incline Plank: Hands on desk or counter, straight line from heels to head. Hold 30 seconds. Easier than floor plank.
done_condition: when you hold for 30 seconds

activity: Standing Figure-4: Cross ankle over opposite knee, slowly lower into gentle squat. Hold 30 seconds each side. Works outer hip, glutes, piriformis.
done_condition: when both sides held for 30 seconds

activity: Upper Trap Stretch: Hold chair to anchor shoulder down, tilt head toward opposite shoulder. Hold 30 seconds each side.
done_condition: when both sides held for 30 seconds

activity: Levator Scapulae Stretch: Turn head 45°, drop chin toward armpit. Hold 20 seconds each side. Releases neck-shoulder tension.
done_condition: when both sides held for 20 seconds

activity: Cold Water Diving Reflex: Hold breath, splash cold water on face (eyes, cheeks) for 15-30 seconds. Triggers vagal activation, slows heart 10-25%.
done_condition: when you've applied cold water to face for 15-30 seconds while holding breath

activity: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding: Name 5 things you SEE (specific details), 4 you can TOUCH, 3 you HEAR, 2 you SMELL, 1 you TASTE.
done_condition: when you've identified all items in the 5-4-3-2-1 sequence with specific details

activity: Quick 3-3-3 Grounding: Name 3 things you see, 3 things you hear, move 3 body parts. Simplified anxiety reset.
done_condition: when you've completed all three sets of three

activity: Ear Massage (vagal activation): Small circles on tragus (flap at ear canal) for 1 min, then gently pull earlobes. Note any sighing/yawning.
done_condition: when you've massaged tragus and earlobes for 2 minutes

activity: Walk to Ikore Kofi inside Mercado de Ruzafa for a standing-bar specialty coffee. Beans roasted on-site. Quick market atmosphere break.
done_condition: when you've had your coffee and returned

activity: Walk to El Contraste (Carrer de Sant Valero, 12) for churros with thick hot chocolate. Frequented by locals. Best times: morning or 6pm.
done_condition: when you've had your churros and returned

activity: Walk to Jardín Urbano (Carrer de Pere III el Gran) for a botanical retreat. Lush plants, old books, oil paintings. Order something vegan.
done_condition: when you've sat among the plants for at least 3 minutes

activity: Walk to Cathedral's Apostles' Gate to watch Tribunal de las Aguas (Thursdays at noon ONLY). World's oldest court—8 farmers in black resolving water disputes.
done_condition: when you've watched the tribunal proceedings

activity: Walk to Central Post Office (Plaza Ayuntamiento). Look up at the glass dome: 370 panels, 3,500 stained glass pieces showing all Spanish province coats of arms.
done_condition: when you've counted 5 different province coats of arms

activity: Three Breaths Tea Ritual: 3 breaths while water heats (notice sounds), 3 while steeping (watch color change), 3 before drinking (feel warmth).
done_condition: when you've completed three conscious breaths at each stage

activity: Sensory Tea Meditation: LISTEN to water (30s), WATCH color change (1min), FEEL cup warmth (30s), SMELL aroma (30s), TASTE first sip slowly (2min).
done_condition: when you've consciously engaged each sense in sequence

activity: Ichigo Ichie pause: Before your next drink/bite, acknowledge this moment will never occur exactly this way again. Give it 2 minutes of full attention.
done_condition: when you've given 2 minutes of undivided attention to the moment

activity: Supine Spinal Twist: Lie on back, knees to chest, lower both to one side. Arms in T, shoulders on floor. Hold 2 minutes each side.
done_condition: when both sides held for 2 minutes

activity: McGill Side Bridge: From forearm and bent knees, lift hips to straight line. Do 3-2-1 pattern (10-sec holds) each side.
done_condition: when you complete 3-2-1 pattern each side with 10-second holds

activity: McGill Bird-Dog: Tabletop, extend opposite arm/leg parallel to floor. Hips level (imagine balancing water). Do 3-2-1 pattern (8-sec holds) each side.
done_condition: when you complete 3-2-1 pattern each side with 8-second holds
